nodes.text: The guided missile was a missile that could be remotely fired, normally from a starfighter. The guided missile however had a short lifetime and burned itself out after a period of time.

These missiles were typically fired by a co-pilot in starfighters. These missiles were sometimes used in TIE/sa bombers and Y-wings. The missile could inflict a great deal of damage upon its target, and would nearly always kill foot soldiers. The missile was commonly pink when in flight. The missile was fired out of the co-pilot's section of the TIE bomber.
